SELECT WEBHOOK_ID , WEBHOOK_NM , WEBHOOK_TYPE_CD , WEBHOOK_TARGET_URL , USE_CD , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP FROM WHK1000 WHERE 1=1 AND WEBHOOK_TYPE_CD = #webhookTypeCd#
AND USE_CD = #useCd#
ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC

SELECT A.WEBHOOK_ID , A.WEBHOOK_NM , A.WEBHOOK_TYPE_CD , A.WEBHOOK_TARGET_URL , A.USE_CD , B.WEBHOOK_LOG_ID B.WEBHOOK_RESULT TO_CHAR(B.WEBHOOK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WEBHOOK_DATE B.WEBHOOK_DATA B.WEBHOOK_LOG B.WEBHOOK_RESULT_DATA TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM WHK1000 A INNER JOIN WHK1001 ON (A.WEBHOOK_ID = B.WEBHOOK_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.WEBHOOK_ID = #webhookId#
AND A.USE_CD = #useCd#
ORDER BY B.WEBHOOK_DATE DESC
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_WEBHOOK_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_WEBHOOK_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'WHK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_WEBHOOK_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(WEBHOOK_ID) AS NEW_WEBHOOK_ID FROM WHK1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND REP_ID LIKE 'WHK' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO WHK1000 ( WEBHOOK_ID , WEBHOOK_NM , WEBHOOK_TYPE_CD , WEBHOOK_TARGET_URL , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #newWebhookId# , #webhookNm# , #webhookTypeCd# , #webhookTargetUrl# , #useCd# , SYSDATE , #empId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #empId# , #modifyUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE WHK1000 SET WEBHOOK_NM , WEBHOOK_TYPE_CD , WEBHOOK_TARGET_URL , USE_CD , MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #empId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND WEBHOOK_ID = #webhookId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM WHK1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND WEBHOOK_ID = #webhookId#

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_WEBHOOK_LOG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_WEBHOOK_LOG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'LOG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_WEBHOOK_LOG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(WEBHOOK_LOG_ID) AS NEW_WEBHOOK_LOG_ID FROM WHK1000 A WHERE 1=1 AND WEBHOOK_ID = #webhookId# AND REP_ID LIKE 'LOG' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
INSERT INTO WHK1001 ( WEBHOOK_ID, WEBHOOK_LOG_ID, WEBHOOK_RESULT ,WEBHOOK_DATE, WEBHOOK_DATA, WEBHOOK_LOG ,WEBHOOK_RESULT_DATA ,REG_DTM, REG_USR_ID, REG_USR_IP ,MODIFY_DTM, MODIFY_USR_ID, MODIFY_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #webhookId#, #newWebhookLogId#, #webhookResult# ,SYSDATE, #webhookData#, #webhookLog# ,#webhookResultData# #ciId#, #repId# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# ,SYSDATE, #regUsrId#, #regUsrIp# )
